app.name: Nintendont
app.long_description:
Committers: GerbilSoft, JoostinOnline, GreyRogue, Howard, Cyan, nastys, NFreak [TE]
Project website: https://github.com/tomorrow-nf/Nintendont-TE
Nintendont allows you to run GameCube games on a Wii from an SD or HDD device.
Tournament Edition enables Native Control by default and prevents users from disabling it. This is to prevent headache with misconfigured SSBM tournament setups.
